```{r first try}
library(tidyverse)

csvdata <- read_csv("qog_eureg_wide1_nov20.csv")

lessdata <- select(csvdata, region_name, year)

ggplot(data = lessdata) +
    geom_point(mapping = aes(x = year, y = region_name))
```

```{r first real data}
library(tidyverse)

alldata <- read_csv("qog_eureg_wide1_nov20.csv")

wasteHotels <- select(alldata, eu_tour_nstour_estbl_nuts1, eu_env_wasdsp_i_nuts1)

ggplot(data = wasteHotels) + 
    geom_point(mapping = aes(x = eu_env_wasdsp_i_nuts1, y = eu_tour_nstour_estbl_nuts1))
```
